title: Nee Tholaindhaayo Lyrics Kavalai Vendam
stanzas:
en nizhalai
nee pirindhaal
en uyir pirinthida kandene
en manathin
karaigalile
un alai varuvadhai kandene

naan uyir vaazhum
ini oru naalum
unai maraven
anbe

nee tholaindhaayo
naan thedi thedi varuvatharku
nee tholaindhaayo
naan unai thedi varuvatharku
nee tholaindhaayo
naan thedi thedi varuvatharku

naan irundhaal
unnodu
en aayul neelumadi

paarkum dhisai ellam
nee varaintha kaadhal thondrudhe
serkum vidhi endre
naan ninaika kaalam odudhe

en kannerilum
un sirippai thaan
thedi paarkiren

naan kan moodiye
un vizhigalil
moozhgi pogiren

nee tholaindhaayo
naan thedi thedi varuvatharku
nee tholaindhaayo
naan unai thedi varuvatharku
nee tholaindhaayo
naan thedi thedi varuvatharku

naan irundhaal
unnodu
en aayul neelumadi

nee tholaindhaayo
naan thedi thedi varuvatharku
nee tholaindhaayo
naan unai thedi varuvatharku
nee tholaindhaayo
naan thedi thedi varuvatharku

naan irundhaal
unnodu
en thedal theerumadi
